Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2008 03:04PM rondami wrote: Hi Angel.  I'm right with you.  Waiting for my MRI results after inconclusive mammogram & ultrasound.  My MRI was last Thursday, and I have an appt with the surgeon this Thursday to discuss the results.  I didn't ask, but if I heard correctly she'll be doing a biopsy regardless of the MRI results.  Guess I'll find out Thursday, but waiting is the worse.  I know that life has to go on during this waiting, but it's hard to think of much else.  I work full-time and go to school part-time (I'm 31 and finishing up my BBA), but it's always there in the back of my mind.  Please let us know how your results come back.  If you're like me, you just want to know.  The land of the unknown is the worse.  If you know what you're dealing with you can plan.  Right now you have no choice but to wait.  I'm waiting with you ... Take care, Ronda
Posts.Title: WAITING FOR MRI ANGELLOVESROB esserbre
